name: Cadaver Clash!
description:
In CADAVER CLASH! You play as a guard protecting a graveyard from potential troublemakers, one fateful night a massive flash happened and the dead came to life, they now want to take your soul as punishment for them being buried all these years. 

FIGHT BACK By using your deadly weapon, and shoot through skeletons, bats and ghosts! Try and survive 10 waves, if you dare, but it may get more challenging throughout. 

How I implemented the theme isn't visible at first, the dead is opposite to the living. The dead is attracted to killing the guard. "Opposites attract"


MADE FOR THE XANDERJAM 4 

Thank you for playing! <3

Attributions
